title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, October 12, 2021
description: It was on this day in 1892 that the Pledge of Allegiance was recited en masse for the first time, by more than 2 million students.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1892 that the Pledge of Allegiance was recited en masse for the first time, by more than 2 million students.
